messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] A Plea
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes please.  I ve really found your unschooling posts useful. Tia No one can make you feel inferior without your consent. Eleanor Roosevelt
messages.messageBody:
>
>PS
>Ned, many of us have said we enjoyed your posts on your family's unschooling
>journey. Maybe we could get back to those?

Yes please. I've really found your unschooling posts useful.
Tia


No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
Eleanor Roosevelt

Tia Leschke

On Vancouver Island

messages.subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] A Plea
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/8/02 11:09:30 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Dear Ned Vare: This list is not the place to bring these topics up. Please Honor That. You
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/8/02 11:09:30 AM Central Daylight Time,
nedvare@... writes:


> Maybe what you are trying to say to me is, this list is not the place to
> bring these topics up...if so, I'll honor that. Let us know.
>
> Thanks for all your work.
>
> Ned Vare

Dear Ned Vare:
This list is not the place to bring these topics up. Please Honor That. You
said you would. The majority requests that you would, the list moderator and
the list owner have gently requested that you would. Although some have said
"Don't speak for me... I like Ned's posts..." This does not negate that this
list is still not the place for political grandstanding. There are other
lists more suited for this kind of debate. Please.
~Nancy

PS
Ned, many of us have said we enjoyed your posts on your family's unschooling
journey. Maybe we could get back to those?
~N.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
